ComicInfo.Series: Cosmic Ghost Rider Destroys Marvel History
ComicInfo.Summary: Cosmic Ghost Rider becomes an X-Man — whether Charles Xavier likes it or not! What could make Cosmic Ghost Rider even more powerful? How about slapping some Phoenix Force in there! Wolverine’s not the only guy with a sweet motorcycle in this issue!
